room_title: Escape room "Silent Space" by Escape Room RVA in Richmond (VA)
room_description: You are a member of a search and rescue mission to recover the crew of the Star Ship Stratagem, who’ve been missing for 22 days, 7 hours, and 26 minutes. You’ve been successful in finding the missing ship, but have received only radio silence in the way of communication from the crew. With no other options you’ve decided to board the ship in hopes of recovering the missing members of the S. S. Stratagem...Only in silence will you survive what lays within…
